newsitem.title: USA: Data Dimensions names Newbold COO.
newsitem.headline: Data Dimensions names Newbold COO.

text.p: Data Dimensions Inc Tuesday named Philip Newbold to the position of executive vice president and chief operating officer.
In this role, Newbold will be responsible for all operations related to the company's consulting services, licensing programs and other businesses that provide solutions to the Year 2000 problem.

Newbold was formerly vice president and director of information technology services for Kaiser Permanente Northern California, where he oversaw all computer services, networking and systems development.
In connection with the appointment, Newbold will vacate his position as a member of the board of directors for Data Dimensions, a position he has held since June of 1996.
Newbold's new post is a newly created position.
